titles.title: Requiring that unexpended balances in the official allowances of Members of the House of Representatives be returned to the Treasury for deficit reduction.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 3/18/1993--Introduced. Requires that any amount made available to a Member of the House of Representatives for an official allowance be used only by that Member for the period and purpose for which it is made available. Requires unused amounts to be returned to the Treasury for deficit reduction.
